title: Amy Hires ‘Alexa’ For Her Son’s Birthday Party + Bobby Gets Offended By Amy’s "Raging Idiots” Show Review + Lunchbox Calls Restaurants Posing As Celebrities To Make Reservations
itunes:title: Amy Hires ‘Alexa’ For Her Son’s Birthday Party + Bobby Gets Offended By Amy’s "Raging Idiots” Show Review + Lunchbox Calls Restaurants Posing As Celebrities To Make Reservations
description:
Amy’s son turned 9 over the weekend and she hired a woman to play Amazon’s Alexa to show up to the party. Bobby played two Raging Idiots show over the weekend and was a little offended by what Amy said after seeing the show in Austin. Lunchbox called fancy restaurants as famous country artists to see if he could get a last minute reservation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
